# gux-panel-frame

The frame of a single panel. Can also specify the width of the panel with the panel props.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                   | Type     | Default   |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------- | -------- | --------- |
| `width`  | `width`   | Style width of the component. | `string` | `'280px'` |
